Name: Filtvelt Coalition
ReputationStatements: We have a job for you, Mercenary scum. As distasteful as that is to us.
Mercenary though you may be, you seem effective enough. The Coalition has need of your skills, Commander.
Greetings, Commander. The Coalition requires aid from someone outside of our own forces. Hopefully you can help us.
The Coalition requires mercenaries of skill, Commander, and you fit the bill nicely. With luck, we will both profit from this arrangement.
You have served us well in the past, Commander. We value this relationship, and would like to preserve it.
Greetings, Commander. Once again, the Coalition requires your services. Should you be successful, we will both profit.
Honored friend! Your acts in service to the Coalition have not been forgotten. In light of this, we present you with this choice contract.
MissionSuccessStatements: Excellent performance, Commander. The Filtvelt Coalition are pleased with what you have accomplished and the skill you've evidenced. Expect our payment in full!
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Well, let it never be said the Coalition does not believe in charity. Obviously, your skills could not be equivalent to our own regular armies—so we do not blame you for your inability to complete the contract.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Come now, mercenary—did you even try to complete the contract, or did you believe we'd pay you for your own inadequacies? Such a dismal performance cannot be rewarded, only reprimanded.
Description: The Filtvelt Coalition is a Periphery realm that formed on February 20, 3072 from worlds that seceded from the Federated Suns
